name: review_filters_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool booking.
Tool description: This API helps to query rooms, price, facilities, policities, etc information from many hotels around the world to create a travel site such as : booking.com
API description: Fetch supported options metadata for filtering hotel reviews.

hotel_id.description: The unique identifier of the hotel from the properties list API.

filter_language.description: One of the followings (separated by comma for multiple values): en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

filter_customer_type.description: One of the followings (separated by comma for multiple values) : couple|family_with_children|review_category_group_of_friends|solo_traveller
